title: Mahindra Finance plans credit-card business entry; eyes double-digit business growth in FY23, says MD - Moneycontrol
content: Mahindra Finance plans credit-card business entry; eyes double-digit business growth in FY23, says MD  Moneycontrol
description: The plan comes on the heels of RBIâ€™s directive that NBFCs can offer credit cards if they receive regulatory permission and have a certificate of registration.
